studyprogress
Class StudyProgressManager

java.lang.Object
  studyprogress.StudyProgressManager

public class StudyProgressManager
extends java.lang.Object

StudyProgressManager is the class containing the basic operations of the StudyProgress-application, such as logging in and creating a user.

Field Detail

usernamelist

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> usernamelist
List of user names of all existing users. Can be null if loading the user name list fails. If null, expect the logInUser-method of this class to terminate the program.

modelmodules

private java.util.ArrayList<Module> modelmodules
List of all pre-made model Modules. Is never null. May be empty.

modelmodulenames

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> modelmodulenames
List of names of all pre-made model Modules. Is never null. May be empty.

userfilepath

private java.lang.String userfilepath
User file path. Is never null.

userdirectorypath

private java.lang.String userdirectorypath
User directory path. Is never null.

userfile

private java.io.File userfile
User file. Is never null.

userdirectory

private java.io.File userdirectory
User directory. Is never null.

modelsfile

private java.io.File modelsfile
Model Modules file. Is never null.

Constructor Detail

StudyProgressManager

public StudyProgressManager()
Class constructor. Checks if the user directory exists and if it doesn't, tries to create it. If creating the user directory fails, terminates the program with exit status 1. If any other exceptions are thrown when loading the essential program data, this method also terminates the execution with status 1.

Method Detail

logInUser

public Student logInUser(java.lang.String username)
Logs in a user by username.

Parameters:
username - Name of the user to log in. If username is not found, returns null.
Returns:
Student-object representing the logged-in user.

createNewUser

public boolean createNewUser(java.lang.String username)
Attempts to create a new user by the name username. If username is reserved to another user or user files cannot be written, returns false. If not, creates the new user and returns true.

Parameters:
username - Name of the new user to create.
Returns:
True if a new user was created, otherwise false.

modelModulesToStringArray

public java.lang.String[] modelModulesToStringArray()
Returns an array of String representations of all pre-made model study Modules. These representations contain Module names and total credits of the Modules.

Returns:
An array of String representations of all model Modules.

moduleCoursesToStringArray

public java.lang.String[] moduleCoursesToStringArray(int moduleindex)
Returns an array of String representations of all pre-made model Courses of a specified model Module.

Parameters:
moduleindex - List index of the desired model Module. Indices start from 0.
Returns:
An array of String representations of model Courses.

modelNameListContains

public int modelNameListContains(java.lang.String name)
Checks if a model Module specified by name exists and if it does, returns its index on the model Module list. If the Module does not exist, returns -1. Note that the indices on the list start from 0.

Parameters:
name - Name of the model Module to search for.
Returns:
List index of the model Module or -1 if Module not found.

getModelModule

public Module getModelModule(int moduleindex)
Gets a model Module specified by list index.

Parameters:
moduleindex - List index of the desired Module. Indices start from 0.
Returns:
The model Module specified by the index or null if index is out of range.

getNumberOfModelModules

public int getNumberOfModelModules()
Gets the total number of pre-made model Modules distributed with this program.

Returns:
Total number of pre-made model Modules.

deleteFile

public static void deleteFile(java.lang.String filepath)
Deletes a file specified by file path String. If the specified file doesn't exist, does nothing.

Parameters:
filepath - Path of the file to delete.

loadUserListFromFile

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadUserListFromFile()
Loads the user name list from the users text file.

Returns:
List of all user names.

writeUserNameList

private void writeUserNameList()
Writes the user name list to the users text file.

loadModelModules

private void loadModelModules()
Loads the list of model Modules from models.txt file.
